Name: Ephemeral Response
Story Background: In a fleeting moment of danger, the spellcaster conjured an ephemeral barrier to deflect an incoming attack, evoking the transitory nature of magic.
Ability: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 2.
Appearance Description: A wave of ephemeral energy forming a translucent shield, deflecting an impending spell with the transient shimmer of iridescent blue and ethereal wisps. The artwork captures the evanescent beauty of ephemeral response with a vibrant play of light and color.
